articles.author: Tom Loy
articles.title: Four potential Virginia Tech coaching candidates for Hokies to consider with football recruiting in mind - 247Sports
articles.description: Virginia Techs Sunday firing of Brent Pry starts an important coaching search for the Hokies With football recruiting in mind here are four potential candidates for them to consider
articles.content: There was a time when Virginia Tech football carried significant weight nationally. The Hokies won big games. They won ACC championships. They competed for national titles. It's been quite some time … [+2745 chars]
